TopicTitle: Is there a way to edit the sky/space texture?

Articles.Content:
Hi, I was wondering if there is any way to edit the skybox texture to include a more atmospheric feel?

If not, are better textures for the land/skybox planned for future releases? I understand that it may not fit in with the art style, but as of right now, the sky texture is almost featureless. what a shame.

EDIT: I apologize if this is in the wrong area.

I don't believe it is possible to easily change the sky textures just yet no. But don't worry, the current graphics is mostly placeholder at the moment while the under the hood stuff gets done. The game still has a long way to go and graphics will probably remain on the back burner for now.
Knowing Unity and UDK it's 'hard wired' into KSP_DATA's asset packages.

Knowing Unity and UDK it's 'hard wired' into KSP_DATA's asset packages.

are there any known ways to access these files that you know of?

probably not an easy thing to do at the moment... but i'll note that up as a feature request - shouldn't be all too much hassle to pull this off, then you could probably change those as desired/needed...

but ATM, 'im afraid it's all stuffed pretty tight in there :
